name: Bank Heist Noir
description:
Description:

You are a master thief who has perfectly infiltrated a bank vault by sneaking through the air ducts and impersonating a security guard… the only problem is the sack full of money is too heavy, so you can’t use the ducts to escape! Instead, you’ll have to sneak the money bag out by disguising it as trash.  Utilize two uniforms to disguise yourself and hide in plain sight! Sneak past guards and skirt around dogs to escape the bank and live a life of fancy.

Instructions:

A, W, S, D - move left, up, down, or right

F - interact with trash can or intercom

E - change uniform

The guard uniform allows you to open door and use intercoms.

The janitor uniform allows you to be seen by guards while carrying the bag.

If you bump into a guard or enter the range of a guard dog, you will be sent to the last checkpoint minus a tenth of your money; if you run out of money, it’s game over!
